title: United Tech to invest $15 billion in U.S. over next five years
text:
May 23, 2018 / 1:45 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago United Tech to invest $15 billion in U.S. over next five years Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - United Technologies Corp ( UTX.N ) will invest more than $15 billion (11.2 billion pounds) in research and development and capital spending in the United States over the next five years, the maker of Pratt & Whitney aircraft engines said on Wednesday. FILE PHOTO: United Technologies logo is displayed on a screen at the post where it's stock is traded on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York, U.S., September 5, 2017. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid
The Farmington, Connecticut-headquartered company also plans to hire 35,000 people over that time. Reporting by Sanjana Shivdas in Bengaluru; Editing by Sai Sachin Ravikumar
